com.epam.recreation_module.controller

Class EventController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.recreation_module.controller.EventController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/event")
 @CrossOrigin
public class EventController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class EventController is an endpoint of the API which used for Events Annotated by RestController with no parameters to provide answer in application/json Annotated by RequestMapping with parameter value = "/event" Annotated by CrossOrigin with no parameters to give permission to connection So that EventController is accessed by sending requests to /event
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yulchiev Abbos
